name: Assassin's Creed Syndicate: The Dreadful Crimes
name_original: Assassin's Creed Syndicate: The Dreadful Crimes
description:
Assassin's Creed Syndicate: The Dreadful Crimes is an action game developed by Ubisoft Quebec. It came out on 23-10-2015. It was published by Ubisoft Entertainment. Most rawgers rated the game as "Recommended".
Assassin's Creed Syndicate: The Dreadful Crimes is available on PC.
